tool.name: velvetg

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Only the value will be passed in the argument list (ie. the switch won't be used)
Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Removal of low coverage nodes AFTER tour bus or allow the system to infer it. If blank,: no removal, 'auto' will let velvet pick a cov_cutoff, otherwise specify an integer (e.g to trial several cov_cutoff values).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Expected distance between two paired end reads (default: no read pairing)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Tracking of short read positions in assembly (default: no tracking)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Minimum contig length exported to contigs.fa file (default: hash length * 2)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Export assembly to AMOS file (default: no export)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Expected coverage of unique regions or allow the system to infer it (default: no long or paired-end read resolution)

parameter_list.switch_use__description: Both the switch and the value will be passed in the argument list. They will be separated by a space.
parameter_list.helptext: Removal of nodes with low long-read coverage AFTER tour bus (default: no removal).

parameter_list.switch_use__description: The switch and the value won't be passed in the argument list.

tool.description:
Velvetg is the core of Velvet where the de Bruijn graph is built then manipu-
lated. Run velveth first.
